RainbowRabBits

What are the RainbowRabBits

Every rabbit is unique an handcrafted 32x32 with the colors of Sweetie-16. There will never exist more then 10000 rabbits in this collection and they will be revealed when enough rabbits have found a new home.

What is so special about them

All parts of the body have different colors, although each combination is more or less rare. some colors, especially color gradients, are particularly rare. The face consists of a combination of eyes and mouth, although here too there are rare combinations.

100 / 10000

So far 100 RainbowRabBits have been revealed.
